name: The King's Castle
description:
Attention, Attention!!!

The castle is in danger.! Enemies from neighboring kingdoms are approaching. Take everything under control, because there is no one left. Everyone relies only on you.

Your mission in this tower defense game is to protect your kingdom until the end. Build your own army, strengthen the defense and do not allow anyone to steal your lands. Watch out for orcs who only want to destroy everything they see in their path. Everyone wants to feel safe...

Game Features :
- Territory expansion
- Army Upgrade ( Mana,Castle`s Hp,Army size)
- The possibility of purchasing a super hero
- Multiple levels
